title: Gordon Falcon
text: Gordon Falcon is a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> professionally for the <a href="Penrith%20Panthers">Penrith Panthers</a> and <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> for the <a href="New%20Zealand%20M%C4%81ori%20rugby%20union%20team">New Zealand Māori</a> and <a href="Hawke%27s%20Bay%20Rugby%20Union">Hawke's Bay</a>.
